description:
If Joseph Biden visits the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA) between June 2, 2022, and July 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a "visit" is defined as Joseph Biden physically entering the terrestrial or maritime territory of Saudi Arabia. Whether or not Joseph Biden enters Saudi Arabian airspace during the timeframe of this market will have no bearing on a positive resolution.

The primary resolution source for this information will be official information from government of the United States of America, official information from Joseph Biden or released by his verified social media accounts (e.g. https://twitter.com/joebiden), and official information from KSA (e.g. https://twitter.com/KSAmofaEN); however, other credible reporting may be considered.

events.title: Will President Biden visit Saudi Arabia before July 2022?

question: Will President Biden visit Saudi Arabia before July 2022?
